text: 11. Proposals for development that would affect historic parks, gardens and spaces (as shown on the policies map) must: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 193 PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES a. include a heritage impact assessment setting out the likely impact which it would have upon its significance and the means by which any harm might be mitigated; b. conserve those features which form an integral part of the special character or appearance of the park, garden or square; and c. ensure they do not detract from the enjoyment, layout, design, character, appearance or setting, key views into and out of the space, or prejudice its future restoration. 12.
